text: Ingaba ngumnqa na ebantwini into yokuba Sithumele isiTyhilelo seThu kwindoda ephuma phakathi kwabo?2 (Sithi kuyo): “Lumkisa abantu (ngoMlilo ozayo), unike iindaba ezivuyisayo kwabo bakholwayo, zokuba baza kuyifumana imivuzo yabo eNkosini yabo yezenzo zabo ezilungileyo!” Kodwa abangakholwayo bathi: “Inene Lo (uMuhammad) ngumenzi wemilingo ocacileyo.”
